welcome_text1: This is the final task of the React 2023 Q1 course at Rolling Scopes School.
welcome_text2: We are thrilled to have you here and excited to showcase what we've accomplished throughout this course. We have chosen to work with the Star Wars API, which is an extensive and rich source of data from the beloved Star Wars universe.
